name: Color Ball: Crazy Faces
description:
• Select the color of the wall that the ball is targeting.

    Features:
    • 4 playing modes (Inbox, Jumping, Cannon, Falling).
    • 3 color mode (3 colors, 4 colors, 6 colors).
    • More than 80 stages.
    • Endless modes.
    • 27 Different faces to play with.
